scripts.say: Hey hey, everyone, come take a look at this~
Tada! I've just installed this "Prototype Ship Rigging Construction Module" that Akashi-chan made for me! Now, I'll be able to fight alongside all of you~!
Oooohh, I was just about to ask how you were able to keep up with us. So this is the reason, huh? It doesn't stick out at all - I didn't even notice it!
She's been with us the whole time, Javelin... airhead...
It seems like she has destroyer-type equipment, just like us. The mobility is well-suited for recon missions.
Mmhmm! Every time I saw all of you on the game screen, I'd dream about how much I wanted to try gliding across the ocean myself. I never thought that dream would come true!
It's amazing how quickly you were able to pick up on how to use the ship rigging! Is this because of your "Super AI" abilities?
Heh heh! There's nothing that a Super AI cannot do, as long as you install the plug-in for it! If you're having trouble with anything, just let me know!
"Plug-in...?" I don't quite get, but I'm glad you're confident in yourself. As expected of a Super AI.
(I-I didn't think I'd get praised this much...! It feels... super good?!)
Come to think of it, Miss AI, when we found you, you seemed to be drowning but your clothes didn't even get wet. What's the reason behind that?
Good question! Because I'm an AI, my clothes are basically like holograms so they won't get wet or dirty. However, I sometimes will add them as special effects for my videos.
Well, since holograms are just data, I'm basically naked right now if you think about it~
*gasp*! Is Azur Lane going to get banned in several different countries because of what I just said? I'm so sorry... forget you heard anything!!
Ah, th-that's right! I actually have a variety of different outfits! Since I don't get to use them very often, I'll let you see my cute wardrobe!
Trans--form!
Huh? I can't change my skin? What's going on??
Is it possible... that some data was taken away when we entered the Mirror Sea?
No way...!? What should I do? I really liked those outfits too~!
We might be able to recover the lost data by exploring around. Let's see what we can do.
Th-that's right! As long as we work hard, we'll be sure to find it!? Cheer up, AI-chan!
Laffey... will also do her best...
Yes, you're right! Okay, let's do it~!
BA-DOOSH!!
Woooahhhhhhh! Just when I was starting to get my motivation back, this happens?!
Enemy attack from 6 o'clock!
I see, I see! So this is what you'd call a "tutorial boss!"
